1.0.name: wordpress/eewee-pinterest
1.0.description:
Description longue.

  • positionner un widget pinterest sur le header ou footer de votre site
  • use a shortcode to place a widget on Pinterest page, post, ...

PS: question, eewee.fr.

Dependence

nothing

Shortcode

[eeweepinterest url="http://pinterest.com/username/" imgw="100" w="520" h="350"]

(replace username by your pinterest username)

  • See the Changelog for what's new.
